name: B. Marathon
statement:
Valera takes part in the Berland Marathon. The marathon race starts at
the stadium that can be represented on the plane as a square whose lower
left corner is located at point with coordinates and the length of the
side equals meters. The sides of the square are parallel to coordinate
axes.As the length of the marathon race is very long, Valera needs to
have extra drink during the race. The coach gives Valera a bottle of
drink each meters of the path. We know that Valera starts at the point
with coordinates and runs counter-clockwise. That is, when Valera covers
meters, he reaches the point with coordinates . We also know that the
length of the marathon race equals meters. Help Valera’s coach determine
where he should be located to help Valera. Specifically, determine the
coordinates of Valera’s positions when he covers meters.
editorial:
Letâs notice that after Valera run meters he will be in the same point
from which he started. Valera will have run meters before he gets -th
bottle of drink. Letâs calculate the value how many laps he will run.
Then he have already run meters on his last lap. It is easy to get
Valeraâs position from this . For example, if then Valera will be in the
point with coordinates . You can consider the other three cases in the
same manner.
